body:
In the walls map the village a few minutes ago I was team killed by a nub. I just wanted to ask if there is anyway to make it so you can't place buckets of lava on you're teammates? 
I don't know if this would have been enough evidence to report:

title: Team killers -.-

This happened to me on the Walls map ,Jungle. I was afk cause I had to use the bathroom.
When I came back on I saw I was burnt in to pieces. I got really mad so I reported him for teamkilling.
